name: pdf-text-extractor
title: PDF Text Extractor
description: Extract all text content from PDF documents to plain text files
content:
Overview

This application extracts all text content from PDF documents and saves it to a plain text (.txt) file. Built using PyMuPDF, it provides accurate text extraction while preserving page boundaries.

Features

  • Extract text from all pages of a PDF document
  • Page separators for easy navigation
  • UTF-8 encoding support for international characters
  • Automatic installation of dependencies

Parameters

  • PDF File: Upload your PDF file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for the text output

Output

The application generates a text file with the same base name as your input PDF (e.g., document.pdf becomes document.txt). Each page's content is separated by a page header.

Use Cases

  • Extracting text for analysis or processing
  • Making PDF content searchable and editable
  • Converting PDF documents for text mining
  • Creating plain text archives of PDF documents
command: rm -rf prod_apps 2>/dev/null || true && git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps && python "prod_apps/python/pdf_text_extractor.py" "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}"
